title: I'm unable to change the matching attribute
description: - This is expected. The matching attribute is fixed for cross-tenant sync. This is a security feature to ensure that the source tenant does not take over a user in the target tenant incorrectly.

aiSummary.overview: - This is expected. The matching attribute is fixed for cross-tenant sync. This is a security feature to ensure that the source tenant does not take over a user in the target tenant incorrectly. This issue relates to synchronization functionality. The issue typically affects organization-wide.
